TopicTitle: [AAR] The Grand Tour - Voyage To The Planets

Articles.Content:
Or will they?! :dum dum:

Hey, you missed a 'Dum' there... oh, wait. That probably would be too dum anyway

And on a more serious note... like the rover! Foldable, flat-packed and cute. Not sure about the white tires. Plus comes with added mystery and suspense (or danger and excitement, danger and excitement... oh I'm showing my age now. I seriously doubt anyone will get THAT reference! I think I'm a little ditzy today.... Today? Hah! *ahem*)

Edited August 23, 2013 by Patupi

Nice rover, where'd you get it?

And great story (and pictures), as always.

There is a lot going on and I don't want to spend time describing every detail. That's why I decided to just show you some thing (literally) which won't be described in the story. In a way, I'm just showing you what's going on off-screen. It's just a test to see if you are interested in something like this, so some feedback would be great Enjoy!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Are those... lawn chairs?
Made from the highest quality space PVC! And space tape on the back of course.

That Rozer is such an ass. How can Genanand, Corald an Mallock fail that 'test' when they don't even know that there is another fuel source. For all I know they passed that test with flying colours, because they knew something had to be done when fuel was running out. Looking forward to the next chapter!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

What is the mod with the grey components? I have been looking for it and I cannot seem to find it...

EDIT: Found it- spacetech

Edited August 25, 2013 by Mekan1k
Any hints on when we can expect the next chapter?
I can't wait for the next chapter!

JEDGEL: Err, commander? Why BERTY speaks so weirdly?

ROZER: Safe mode. He's having some problems with the latest update, as it seems, but don't worry, it's probably nothing serious. Anyhow, does anyone have more questions before we proceed?

i think BERTY has been hacked!
Okay so this might be a dumb question but what mod did you get the LAMGMLs from? I'm trying some sort of grand tour myself, but i figured that the dragons basically can't do **** :-D
Correct me if I'm wrong but I think the LAMGMLs are from one of the Soviet Spacecraft mods

Any hints on when we can expect the next chapter?

I would say that probably today

Correct me if I'm wrong but I think the LAMGMLs are from one of the Soviet Spacecraft mods

Yeah, but what one exactly?Maybe I'm dumb, but I have the BobCat ind. Russian Pack installed, but I couldn't find the necessary parts for such a lander.

I would say that probably today

Yay! :-)
I haven't used it but I think from screen shots I've seen it's the Kosmos pack.

Yeah, but what one exactly?
Let me think - circular solar panel from Lionhead, Soyuz capsule from Bobcat, common berthing mechanism from Fusty and the rest is mainly from SpaceTech. Oh, and there are Lazors as well. I will post a .craft file on Spaceport IF I get LAMGML working on the 0.21 version - the Grand Tour is powered by 0.20.2

Sorry for the delay (RL folks), I'll try to post nex chapter ASAP.
I stand corrected

Bobcat's American Spacecraft Pack is the source of the lander in the first pic.
Still no new chapter? Aww...

Still no new chapter? Aww...

I know, it's been a week already but RL happens

I will release the new chapter as soon as I can. And be patient - the whole story will consist of more or less 50 chapters probably
We will be patient. Take it easy, and post when you can.
Definitely. Quality over quantity always rules Keep up the magnificient work czokletmuss

Potentially-off-topic: The thread's been unstickied? THE THREAD'S BEEN UNSTICKIED!! Don't let it slip away into the dark depths of... the second page!
